title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character in the first line is replaced with spaces so that the two lines are visually indented the same, executing the ShiftLeft function does not behave as expected. The text moves in an unexpected way. It is unclear how this behavior is specified, but in the given scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left and the first line should also be shifted left until the space character (i.e., getting rid of the tab). However, if there is a stray space, the behavior is confusing as the text does not shift.
